oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William Carroll portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William Carroll (1788-1844). Portrait, Carroll wears a black coat with a white shirt.
Governor of Tennessee, 1821-1827; 1829-1835. Carroll was Major-General of the Tennessee Miltiia in the final phase of the War of 1812.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carroll, William, 1788-1844
Carroll, William, 1788-1844;Tennessee. Governor;Tennessee. Office of the Governor
Governors
